name: Poly Battles - Zombies!
description:
Welcome to Polylalatopopia where the fun never ends!

We have a brand new adventure for you today! The evil forces of the Polylalatopoian forests have come to town and they're looking for trouble!

They've unleashed a wild potion that turned everyone into zombies!

Grab your pet, get a gun and hop into a never-ending Zombie Slaying extravaganza!

FEATURES -

PETS - Beat the bad guys and earn points to unlock a pet!

CHOOSE YOUR POLY - Choose from dozens of different Polylalatopopians!

CUSTOM WEAPONS - The battlefield can be a little crazy, so we've given you multiple weapons to unlock!

ENDLESS COMBAT - The zombies are always comin' in Polylalatopopia! Matches never end, so get as many kills as you can before someone else gets you!
